Adductor pollicis
``` ::: ::: # Origin {#origin} - **Oblique head**: Base of 2nd and 3rd metacarpal, Capitate @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **Transverse head**: Palmar surface of 3rd metacarpal @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Insertion {#insertion} Medial base of 1st proximal phalanx (*via ulnar sesamoid*) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Innervation {#innervation} [Deep Br. of Ulnar N.]({{< var ref-deep-branch-of-ulnar-nerve.path >}}) ([C8]({{< var ref-nerve-root.c8 >}}), [T1]({{< var ref-nerve-root.t1 >}})) @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Action {#action} - **1st CMC**: Adduction @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 - **1st MCP**: Flexion @gilroyAtlasAnatomy2020 # Notes
